ResetPassword.Subject: Password Reset Request
ResetPassword.Heading: Reset Your Password
ResetPassword.Instructions: We received a request to reset your password. Click the button below to set a new password:
ResetPassword.ExpiryNote: This link will expire in 24 hours.
ResetPassword.NoRequestNote: If you didn't request a password reset, please ignore this email.
ResetPassword.Signature:
Best regards,
The Jump With Jenny Team
